mapper.select: SELECT RESTAURANTIDX, NAME, VEGANTYPE, ADDRESS, CITY, RESTAURANTINFO, MENU, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LIMITPERSON, RESERVEPAY, IMAGES FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(vegun_data RESTAURANTIDX) */ ROWNUM rn, RESTAURANTIDX, NAME, VEGANTYPE, ADDRESS, CITY, RESTAURANTINFO, MENU, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LIMITPERSON, RESERVEPAY, IMAGES FROM vegun_data WHERE CITY = #{keyword} AND ( ( VEGANTYPE = #{typeVege} OR VEGANTYPE = #{typeMilk} OR VEGANTYPE = #{typeEgg} OR VEGANTYPE = #{typeFish} ) OR ( NULLIF(#{typeVege}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{typeMilk}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{typeEgg}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{typeFish}, '') is null ) ) AND rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT RESTAURANTIDX, NAME, VEGANTYPE, ADDRESS, CITY, RESTAURANTINFO, MENU, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LIMITPERSON, RESERVEPAY, IMAGES FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(vegun_data RESTAURANTIDX) */ ROWNUM rn, RESTAURANTIDX, NAME, VEGANTYPE, ADDRESS, CITY, RESTAURANTINFO, MENU, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LIMITPERSON, RESERVEPAY, IMAGES FROM vegun_data WHERE (LATITUDE BETWEEN #{latitude} - 0.019 AND #{latitude} + 0.019) AND (LONGITUDE BETWEEN #{longitude} - 0.022 AND #{longitude} + 0.022) AND ( ( VEGANTYPE = #{typeVege} OR VEGANTYPE = #{typeMilk} OR VEGANTYPE = #{typeEgg} OR VEGANTYPE = #{typeFish} ) OR ( NULLIF(#{typeVege}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{typeMilk}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{typeEgg}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{typeFish}, '') is null ) ) AND rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
